@garethochse Hello @garethochse, 
Air France has taken note of the French authorities' decision to suspend arrivals from 7 Southern African countries until December 1, 2021. The flight schedule has been adapted accordingly : https://t.co/Enp664yZLR . 
We remain available if needed.
Stéphanie
